headline: What Makes Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY) an Investment Bet?
summary: Mott Capital Management, an investment management company, released its Q4 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Stock markets paused in Q4, with the S&P 500 trading sideways from October to year-end. In 2025, the MCM Thematic Growth Strategy gained 11.98%, underperforming the S&P 500’s 17.88%, despite some improvements. The […]

headline: Oil ETFs in Spotlight as US-Iran Nuclear Talks Get Extended
summary: USO and other oil ETFs draw focus as extended US-Iran nuclear talks keep crude volatile, with sanctions and supply risks driving sharp market swings.
